price: 18 Marie dit : « J’implore contre toi la protection du Tout Miséricordieux. Ne m’approche donc pas, si tu crains Allah. »
arabic: قَالَتۡ إِنِّيٓ أَعُوذُ بِٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مِنكَ إِن كُنتَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: qālat innī aʿūdhu bil-raḥmāni minka in kunta taqiyyan
